00041 class MC2String : public vector< char > {
00042    private:
00046       void terminate() {
00047          if ( (*this)[ vector<char>::size() -1 ] != '\0' ) {
00048             push_back( '\0' );
00049          }
00050       }

00056       inline uint32 find( const char* str, char c, uint32 i, 
00057                           uint32 len ) const {
00058 
00059          for ( ; i < len ; ++i ) {
00060             if ( str[ i ] == c ) {
00061                return i;
00062             }
00063          }
00064          return npos;
00065       }
00066

00086       MC2String( const MC2String& str, uint32 pos, uint32 n = npos ) {
00087          push_back( '\0' );
00088          replace( 0, npos, str, pos, n );

00095       MC2String( const char* s, uint32 n ) {
00096          vector<char>::insert( end(), s, 
00097                                s + (n == npos ? strlen( s ) : n ) );
00098          push_back( '\0' );
00099       }

00221       MC2String& insert( uint32 pos, const char* s ) {
00222          if ( pos >= length() ) {
00223             append( s );
00224          } else { // Not at end
00225             vector<char>::insert( begin() + pos, s, s + strlen( s ) ); 
00226          }
00227          return *this;
00228       }

00233             append( s );
00234          } else { // Not at end
00235             vector<char>::insert( begin() + pos, s.begin(), s.end()-1 );

00305       MC2String& erase( uint32 pos = 0, uint32 n = npos ) {
00306          if ( pos >= size() ) {
00307             pos = size() -1;
00308          }
00309          if ( (pos + n >= size()) || (pos + n < n) ) {
00310             n = size() - pos;
00311          }
00312          vector<char>::erase( begin() + pos, begin() + pos + n );
00313          return *this;
00314       }

00335       uint32 find( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00336          uint32 i = pos;
00337          for ( ; i + n <= size() ; ++i )
00338             if ( data() [ i ] == *s &&
00339                  /*StringUtility::*/strncmp( data() + i, s, n ) == 0 )
00340             {
00341                return i;
00342             }
00343          return npos;
00344       }

00362       uint32 rfind( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00363          if ( n > size() ) {
00364             return npos;
00365          }
00366 
00367          uint32 i = size() - n;
00368          if ( i > pos ) {
00369             i = pos;
00370          }
00371 
00372          for ( ++i ; i-- > 0; ) {
00373             if ( data() [ i ] == *s &&
00374                  /*StringUtility::*/strncmp( data() + i, s, n ) == 0 )
00375             {
00376                return i;
00377             }
00378          }
00379          return npos;
00380       }
00381

00383       uint32 rfind( const char* s, uint32 pos = npos ) const {
00384          return rfind( s, pos, strlen( s ) ); 
00385       }

00387 
00388       uint32 rfind( char c, uint32 pos = npos ) const {
00389          if ( size() < 1 ) {
00390             return npos;
00391          }
00392 
00393          uint32 i = size() - 1;
00394          if ( i > pos ) {
00395             i = pos;
00396          }
00397 
00398          for ( ++i ; i-- > 0; )
00399             if ( data ()[ i ] == c ) {
00400                return i;
00401             }
00402          return npos;
00403       }

00405       uint32 find_first_not_of( char c, uint32 pos = 0 ) const {
00406          for ( uint32 i = pos; i < size(); ++i ) {
00407             if ( data()[ i ] != c )
00408                return i;
00409          }
00410          return npos;
00411       }

00413       size_type find_first_not_of(const char *ptr, size_type off = 0) const
00414       {
00415          return find_first_not_of(ptr, off, strlen(ptr));
00416       }
00417    
00418       size_type find_first_not_of(const char *ptr, 
00419                                   size_type off, size_type count) const
00420       {
00421          const char* const end_of = ptr + count; //end of characters to skip.
00422          vector<char>::const_iterator it = begin() + off; //jump offset
00423          for( ; it != end(); ++it){
00424             if( end_of == std::find(ptr, end_of, *it) ) {
00425                break; //found a character not in ptr. Search no more.
00426             }
00427          }
00428    
00429          return (it != end()) ? (it - begin()) : npos;
00430       }
00431    
00432       size_type find_first_not_of(const MC2String& right, size_type off = 0) const
00433       {
00434          return find_first_of(right.c_str(), off);
00435       }

00442       uint32 find_first_of( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00443          uint32 i = pos;
00444          for ( ; i < size() ; ++i ) {
00445             if ( find( s, data()[ i ], 0, n ) != npos ) {
00446                return i;
00447             }
00448          }
00449          return npos;
00450       }

00468       uint32 find_last_of( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00469          if ( size() == 0 ) {
00470             return npos;
00471          }
00472          uint32 i = size() - 1;
00473          if ( i > pos ) {
00474             i = pos;
00475          }
00476          for ( ++i ; i-- > 0 ; ) {
00477             if ( find( s, data()[ i ], 0, n ) != npos ) {
00478                return i;
00479             }
00480          }
00481          return npos;
00482       }

00497       uint32 find_last_not_of( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00498 
00499          if ( size() == 0){
00500             return npos;
00501          }
00502 
00503          uint32 i = size() - 1;
00504          if (i > pos){
00505             i = pos;
00506          }
00507 
00508          for ( ++i; i-- > 0;){
00509             if ( find (s, data () [i], 0, n) == npos){
00510                return i;
00511             }
00512          }
00513          
00514          return npos;
00515       }

00549       MC2String substr( uint32 pos = 0, uint32 n = npos ) const {
00550          if ( n != npos ) {
00551             if ( pos + n >= size() ) {
00552                n = size() - pos;
00553             }
00554          }
00555          return MC2String( data()+pos, n ); 
00556       }

00558 
00559       int compare( const MC2String& str, uint32 pos = 0, 
00560                    uint32 n = npos ) const 
00561       {
00562          if ( pos > size() ) {
00563             return npos;
00564          }
00565 
00566          uint32 rlen = size() - pos;
00567          if ( rlen > n ) {
00568             rlen = n;
00569          }
00570          if ( rlen > str.size() ) {
00571             rlen = str.size();
00572          }
00573          int r = /*StringUtility::*/strncmp( 
00574             data() + pos, str.data (), rlen );
00575          if ( r != 0 ) {
00576             return r;
00577          }
00578          if ( rlen == n ) {
00579             return 0;
00580          }
00581          return (size() - pos) - str.size();
00582       }
00583 
00584 
00585       int compare( const char* s, uint32 pos, uint32 n ) const {
00586          if ( pos > size() ) {
00587             return npos;
00588          }
00589          uint32 rlen = size() - pos;
00590          if ( rlen > n ) {
00591             rlen = n;
00592          }
00593          int r = /*StringUtility::*/strncmp( 
00594             data() + pos, s, rlen );
00595          if ( r != 0 ) {
00596             return r;
00597          }
00598          return (size() - pos) - n;
00599       }

00607       MC2String& replace( uint32 pos1, uint32 n1, const MC2String& str,
00608                           uint32 pos2 = 0, uint32 n2 = npos )
00609       {
00610          const size_t len2 = str.length();
00611 
00612          if ( pos1 == 0 && n1 >= length() && pos2 == 0 && n2 >= len2 ) {
00613             return operator=( str );
00614          }
00615 
00616          MC2_ASSERT( pos2 <= len2 );
00617 
00618          if ( n2 > len2 - pos2 ) {
00619             n2 = len2 - pos2;
00620          }
00621 
00622          return replace (pos1, n1, str.data() + pos2, n2);
00623       }
00624 
00625 
00626       MC2String& replace( uint32 pos, uint32 n1, const char* s, uint32 n2 )
00627       {
00628          uint32 len = size();
00629          MC2_ASSERT( pos <= len );
00630          if ( n1 > len - pos ) {
00631             n1 = len - pos;
00632          }
00633          MC2_ASSERT( len - n1 <= max_size() - n2 );
00634          iterator insPos = vector<char>::erase( begin() + pos, 
00635                                                 begin() + pos + n1 );
00636          bool addEol = false;
00637          if ( insPos == end() ) {
00638             addEol = true;
00639          }
00640          vector<char>::insert( insPos, s, s + n2 );
00641          if ( addEol ) {
00642             push_back( '\0' );
00643          }
00644          return *this;
00645       }
00646 
00647 
00648       MC2String& replace( uint32 pos, uint32 n1, const char* s ) { 
00649          return replace( pos, n1, s, strlen( s ) ); 
00650       }
